description: Cumulative patch manifest for iterative ChatGPT patch rounds.
notes: This file exists to make cumulative patch zips deterministic: include every file listed here (latest version) plus any newly changed/added files each round.
If you do not need cumulative patches, you can ignore this file.

patch_info.description: Cumulative patch: Fix MSVC build breaks introduced by recent UI/controls changes. Adds a centralized SDL include wrapper (SDL_MAIN_HANDLED, SDL_SetMainReady), implements missing Renderer::drawItemIcon for the chest overlay, fixes CLI optional parsing for --record-hash-interval, and fixes KeyBinds chord string formatting. Also silences two MSVC warnings (shadowed 'acted', constant conditional).

summary: Fixed MSVC build errors: added missing Renderer::drawItemIcon and corrected --record-hash-interval parsing (std::optional).
Fixed keybind chord formatting by calling KeyBinds::chordToString(key, mods) correctly.
Centralized SDL includes in src/sdl.hpp (SDL_MAIN_HANDLED) and call SDL_SetMainReady() before SDL_Init(); removed SDL_MAIN_HANDLED redefinition warnings.
Silenced MSVC warnings: removed shadowed 'acted' in chest overlay input handling, and removed a constant conditional in dungeon generation.
